summary: Frontend testing completed for Practice Mode feature on Lab page. All 11 features tested and verified working. Practice Mode opens correctly with chess board showing critical positions, displays two shuffled move options, validates selections, shows Correct/Incorrect feedback, provides hints, retry option, score tracking with progress bar, summary screen with Try Again/Done buttons.

practice_mode_button.details: Practice Critical Moments button appears when game has critical moves (cp_loss >= 150). Button has data-testid='practice-btn'

practice_mode_opens.details: Clicking button opens PracticeModeOverlay component with data-testid='practice-mode'

chess_board_position.details: Chess board shows position from critical move (Move 26 with Lost 1.6 pawns context)

two_move_options.details: Shows best move 'c5' and played move 'Rd8 (what you played)' as shuffled options with data-testid='option-0' and 'option-1'

check_answer_validation.details: Check Answer button (data-testid='check-btn') is disabled until selection made, then validates correctly

correct_incorrect_feedback.details: Shows green 'Correct!' with checkmark for right answer, red 'Not quite' with warning for wrong answer

hint_feature.details: Show hint button reveals position context (e.g., 'You were under pressure here. Think about what this position needs.')

retry_option.details: Retry button (data-testid='retry-btn') appears on wrong answers, clicking it resets to selection mode

score_tracking.details: Score displayed as 'X / Y' format with progress bar showing position count

summary_screen.details: See Results shows summary with score, appropriate message based on percentage, data-testid='practice-summary'

try_again_restarts.details: Try Again button on summary resets score and returns to position 1

done_closes_practice.details: Done button closes practice mode overlay and shows toast notification

mistakes_tab_grouped.details: Mistakes tab shows grouped mistakes with 'Other Mistakes' label and count badge (8). Each item shows Move #, Played move (red), Better move (green), phase

strategy_tab_scrolling.details: Strategy tab is scrollable. scrollHeight: 2122px, clientHeight: 895px. 'For Future Games Like This' section visible at bottom after scrolling

seed_data_creation: None - used existing game with 1 critical position at move 26
context_for_next_testing_agent: Practice Mode feature fully implemented and tested. Key components: PracticeModeOverlay (lines 1089-1344 in Lab.jsx), startPracticeMode function (lines 411-423). The feature extracts up to 5 critical positions (cp_loss >= 150) and presents them as multiple choice questions. User move detection uses FEN turn indicator via isUserMoveFromFen function (lines 279-285).
